description:
Ohtenkun taunts Yozen upon his complete awakening as a yokai, leading him to the founder of Kingo Island himself, Tsuten Kyoshu. Ohtenkun`s goal is to see father and son kill one another, in was his own form of ill-omened revenge against all those who twisted his fate. Meanwhile, Taikobo and Fugen make their way toward Kingo Island`s power reactor. They talk about destroying the reactor in order to destroy it, but their conversation is intended to lure out Bunchu.
Source: crunchyroll
